name: v0.12.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "with_cfg.bzl", version = "0.12.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "with_cfg.bzl",
    sha256 = "23c39c6dfca14dbd1607025c736c8bf4843f31958c0a87fbdb2c7d206585fea4",
    strip_prefix = "with_cfg.bzl-0.12.0",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/releases/download/v0.12.0/with_cfg.bzl-v0.12.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Drop support for Bazel 6 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/209
* Update dependency rules_shell to v0.6.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/210
* Update dependency rules_cc to v0.2.5 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/211
* Update dependency bazel to v8.4.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/212
* Update dependency rules_cc to v0.2.8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/214
* Remove more Bazel 6 workarounds by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/217
* Split exec_properties by exec group by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/216


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/compare/v0.11.1...v0.12.0

name: v0.11.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

bazel_dep(name = "with_cfg.bzl", version = "0.11.1")

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "with_cfg.bzl",
    sha256 = "4da2d80d55c7013e52539b0e100f8f8465142cd05757aaecb3ddca962d735c05",
    strip_prefix = "with_cfg.bzl-0.11.1",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/releases/download/v0.11.1/with_cfg.bzl-v0.11.1.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update dependency rules_cc to v0.1.4 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/194
* Update dependency rules_java to v8.14.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/195
* Update dependency bazel_features to v1.33.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/196
* Update dependency rules_shell to v0.5.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/197
* Update dependency rules_java to v8.15.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/198
* Update dependency rules_shell to v0.6.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/203
* Use test exec group for coverage tools by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/204
* Update dependency bazel to v8.4.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/206
* Update dependency rules_cc to v0.2.4 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/199
* Update actions/checkout action to v5 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/201
* Update dependency bazel_features to v1.35.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/202
* Don't use `TemplateVariableInfo` for internal purposes by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/208
* Update dependency rules_java to v8.15.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/200


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/compare/v0.11.0...v0.11.1

name: v0.8.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "with_cfg.bzl", version = "0.8.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "with_cfg.bzl",
    sha256 = "e217adc62da01febd08e1e074e78b307dc10b40a24175c68c1bf49e3f8d0fbab",
    strip_prefix = "with_cfg.bzl-0.8.0",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/releases/download/v0.8.0/with_cfg.bzl-v0.8.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update dependency bazel_features to v1.22.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/139
* Test and fix docs for Bazel 8 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/141
* Actually check that transition applies in `cc_define_test` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/144
* Update dependency bazel_features to v1.23.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/143
* Use `rule(parent = ...)` when possible by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/145
* Deduplicate `extra_providers` against built-in providers by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/147
* Only forward Python providers by default if available without `load` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/148


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.0

name: v0.6.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "with_cfg.bzl", version = "0.6.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "with_cfg.bzl",
    sha256 = "81a8714ad1542ce6bd69c8e32bf3c4123f137854e6b676d099d8a709348eee56",
    strip_prefix = "with_cfg.bzl-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/releases/download/v0.6.0/with_cfg.bzl-v0.6.0.tar.gz",

```


## What's Changed
* Update MSVC version by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/120
* Update dependency bazel to v7.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/124
* Test against `latest` instead of `last_rc` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/128
* Update dependency bazel to v7.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/127
* Remove `apple_common` providers from default provider set by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/130
* Update bazel-contrib/.github action to v7 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/126


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "with_cfg.bzl", version = "0.5.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "with_cfg.bzl",
    sha256 = "5a923622216ba4545f50d5a3d895be373a9fe3a71f18d0036e276315da4fe67a",
    strip_prefix = "with_cfg.bzl-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/releases/download/v0.5.0/with_cfg.bzl-v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Add a `clone()` method to builders by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/117
  Also includes stricter checks for mutations of builders after `build()` has been called.
  Values passed to `set` or `extend` are now deeply copied instead of retained by reference.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/compare/v0.4.2...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* **BREAKING CHANGE**: Modify path layout to fix relative RPATH lookups by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/104
The paths of executable files generated by transitioned executable targets have changed and now include an additional segment named after the rule. This means that hardcoded runfiles paths need to be updated, e.g. from `my_repo/some/pkg/bin.exe` to `my_repo/some/pkg/bin/bin.exe`. This change is necessary to fix issues with shared library dependencies (see https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/issues/85). You can opt out of this change temporarily via `--no@with_cfg.bzl//:incompatible_same_depth_path_layout`. It is usually recommended to avoid hardcoding runfiles paths of generated files - instead, rely on `$(rlocationpath ...)`.

## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "with_cfg.bzl", version = "0.4.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "with_cfg.bzl",
    sha256 = "c8a28c2bc635270c5ca76e47fa5dd75a0ab3cd76e9fb837a76b8006a5a92a7a6",
    strip_prefix = "with_cfg.bzl-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/releases/download/v0.4.0/with_cfg.bzl-v0.4.0.tar.gz",
)
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

* Improve settings "did you mean" by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/43
* Fix BCR presubmit config by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/44
* Streamline README by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/45
* Update rules_java to 7.0.6 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/49
* Use `Label` in all `select` keys by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/48


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "with_cfg.bzl", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "with_cfg.bzl",
    sha256 = "24e7496f06997e5dbfa1d788281d7fca95c60049a8bdf3250b4bb04c6151f9b0",
    strip_prefix = "with_cfg.bzl-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/releases/download/v0.1.0/with_cfg.bzl-v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update bazel-contrib/.github action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/7
* Rename to `with_cfg.bzl` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/6
* Add `toolchains` attribute to all targets by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/11
* Update actions/checkout action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/10
* Update dependency bazel to v7.0.0-pre.20230917.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/9
* Update bazel-contrib/.github action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/14
* Update dependency rules_cc to v0.0.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/12
* Only set explicitly provided attributes by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/16
* Remove `{}_deploy.jar` implicit target for `java_test` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/17
* Foward native Java providers and add `java_21_library` example by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/18
* Fix repo name in release configs by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/19
* Use `last_rc` for root module builds by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/21
* Fix type determination for (`select`s of) empty lists by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/22
* Speed up CI runs with flags by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/23
* Test with symlinks disabled on Windows by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/24
* Implement and use `map_attr` to determine select type by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/25
* Make implicit output patterns more flexible by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/26
* Ensure that the transition is always idempotent by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/27
* Add opt_filegroup example by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/29
* Update bazel-contrib/.github action to v5 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/28
* Rename example .bzl files and add select for runfile by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/31
* Add `cc_asan_test` example and fix idempotency check  by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/20
* Add `resettable()` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/5
* Add utility functions for location expression rewriting by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/34
* Remove workarounds for Bazel 6.4.0rc1 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/35
* Add `reset_on_attrs()` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/33
* Exclude ASan tests on Windows in BCR presubmit by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/36
* Add README and explain flag requirements in docs by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/37
* Fix release notes template by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/38

## New Contributors
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/7
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/6

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/commits/v0.1.0
